content: *this snuggly afghan is the perfect size for babies and children lion brand yarn * skill level easy level 2 vanna s choice® baby article #840 and/or vanna s choice® article #860 3 colors 2 balls each 6 balls total crochet hook - size i-9 gauge one square = 4-inches 10 cm square a make 28 square b make 28 assemble squares into strips 7 squares each sew strips together and work edging to finish available in different colorways 70796ad sweet pea afghan 1 2005 *sweet pea pink poodle angel white* 81082ad grandma s favorite afghan 2 2009 *dusty green rose white* similar pattern 80736ad misty baby afghan 3 works up to a larger size 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70796ad html 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-gr-mas-favorite-afghan-1 variant=32420287971421 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/misty-baby-afghan
